law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 381, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295 sec. 40, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 96, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Department for elementary and secondary education created -- Deputy superintendent -- Organization.
